text: Liu Liqin is a Chinese former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Liqin represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1966, as part of the Chinese team together with Ying Chun, Wang Shuyuan and Li Fengqing. After three distances she didn't qualify for the final 3000m and finished 25th overall. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Chinese female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Liu Liqin
